meanings.definition: The act or process of decorating.
meanings.sent1: The decorations on the cake made it look beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She bought new decorations for her room to make it more colorful.
meanings.sent3: The decorations on the tree seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the best decoration at the party.
meanings.sent5: The decorations on the walls sparkled like stars in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: She bought some new decorations for the living room.
meanings.sent2: The store had a wide variety of decorations for sale.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the decorations were toys and played with them.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the best decoration in the room.
meanings.sent5: The decorations on the table added a festive touch to the event.

meanings.definition: An award or badge of honor.
meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed his decorations from the military.
meanings.sent2: The decorations on his uniform showed his achievements.
meanings.sent3: The dog wore the decorations around its neck like a champion.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the best decoration she could receive.
meanings.sent5: The decorations on the trophy gleamed under the spotlight.
